    • Method Detail

      • factorize

        public CompletableFuture<String[]> factorize(String composite)
        Performs prime factorization – decomposition of a composite number into a product of smaller prime integers (factors). See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Integer_factorization
        Parameters:
        composite - Hexadecimal representation of u64 composite number.
        Returns:
        Two factors of composite or empty if composite can't be factorized.

      • modularPower

        public CompletableFuture<String> modularPower(String base,
                                              String exponent,
                                              String modulus)
        Performs modular exponentiation for big integers (`base`^`exponent` mod `modulus`). See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Modular_exponentiation
        Parameters:
        base - `base` argument of calculation.
        exponent - `exponent` argument of calculation.
        modulus - `modulus` argument of calculation.
        Returns:
        Result of modular exponentiation

      • tonCrc16

        public CompletableFuture<Number> tonCrc16(String data)
        Calculates CRC16 using TON algorithm.
        Parameters:
        data - Input data for CRC calculation. Encoded with `base64`.
        Returns:
        Calculated CRC for input data.

      • verifySignature

        public CompletableFuture<String> verifySignature(String signed,
                                                 String _public)
        Verifies signed data using the provided public key. Raises error if verification is failed.
        Parameters:
        signed - Signed data that must be verified encoded in `base64`.
        _public - Signer's public key - 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:
        Unsigned data encoded in `base64`.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Hash of input `data`. Encoded with 'hex'.

        Calculates SHA512 hash of the specified data.
        Parameters:
        data - Input data for hash calculation. Encoded with `base64`.
        Returns:
        Hash of input `data`. Encoded with 'hex'.

      • scrypt

        public CompletableFuture<String> scrypt(String password,
                                        String salt,
                                        Number logN,
                                        Number r,
                                        Number p,
                                        Number dkLen)
        Derives key from `password` and `key` using `scrypt` algorithm. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scrypt.

        # Arguments - `log_n` - The log2 of the Scrypt parameter `N` - `r` - The Scrypt parameter `r` - `p` - The Scrypt parameter `p` # Conditions - `log_n` must be less than `64` - `r` must be greater than `0` and less than or equal to `4294967295` - `p` must be greater than `0` and less than `4294967295` # Recommended values sufficient for most use-cases - `log_n = 15` (`n = 32768`) - `r = 8` - `p = 1`

        Parameters:
        password - The password bytes to be hashed. Must be encoded with `base64`.
        salt - Salt bytes that modify the hash to protect against Rainbow table attacks. Must be encoded with `base64`.
        logN - CPU/memory cost parameter
        r - The block size parameter, which fine-tunes sequential memory read size and performance.
        p - Parallelization parameter.
        dkLen - Intended output length in octets of the derived key.
        Returns:
        Derived key. Encoded with `hex`.

      • naclSignKeypairFromSecretKey

        public CompletableFuture<Crypto.KeyPair> naclSignKeypairFromSecretKey(String secret)
        Generates a key pair for signing from the secret key
        Parameters:
        secret - Secret key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string

      • naclSign

        public CompletableFuture<String> naclSign(String unsigned,
                                          String secret)
        Signs data using the signer's secret key.
        Parameters:
        unsigned - Data that must be signed encoded in `base64`.
        secret - Signer's secret key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:
        Signed data, encoded in `base64`.

      • naclSignOpen

        public CompletableFuture<String> naclSignOpen(String signed,
                                              String _public)
        Parameters:
        signed - Signed data that must be unsigned. Encoded with `base64`.
        _public - Signer's public key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:
        Unsigned data, encoded in `base64`.

                                                  String secret)
        Parameters:

        secret - Signer's secret key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:

      • naclBox

        public CompletableFuture<String> naclBox(String decrypted,
                                         String nonce,
                                         String theirPublic,
                                         String secret)
        Public key authenticated encryption

        Encrypt and authenticate a message using the senders secret key, the recievers public key, and a nonce.

        Parameters:
        decrypted - Data that must be encrypted encoded in `base64`.
        nonce - Nonce, encoded in `hex`
        theirPublic - Receiver's public key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        secret - Sender's private key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:
        Encrypted data encoded in `base64`.

      • naclBoxOpen

        public CompletableFuture<String> naclBoxOpen(String encrypted,
                                             String nonce,
                                             String theirPublic,
                                             String secret)
        Decrypt and verify the cipher text using the recievers secret key, the senders public key, and the nonce.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - Data that must be decrypted. Encoded with `base64`.
        nonce -
        theirPublic - Sender's public key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        secret - Receiver's private key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:
        Decrypted data encoded in `base64`.

      • naclSecretBox

        public CompletableFuture<String> naclSecretBox(String decrypted,
                                               String nonce,
                                               String key)
        Encrypt and authenticate message using nonce and secret key.
        Parameters:
        decrypted - Data that must be encrypted. Encoded with `base64`.
        nonce - Nonce in `hex`
        key - Secret key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:
        Encrypted data encoded in `base64`.

      • naclSecretBoxOpen

        public CompletableFuture<String> naclSecretBoxOpen(String encrypted,
                                                   String nonce,
                                                   String key)
        Decrypts and verifies cipher text using `nonce` and secret `key`.
        Parameters:
        encrypted - Data that must be decrypted. Encoded with `base64`.
        nonce - Nonce in `hex`
        key - Public key - unprefixed 0-padded to 64 symbols hex string
        Returns:
        Decrypted data encoded in `base64`.

        Parameters:

        dictionary - Dictionary identifier
        wordCount - Mnemonic word count
        Returns:

      • mnemonicVerify

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> mnemonicVerify(String phrase,
                                                 Number dictionary,
                                                 Number wordCount)
        The phrase supplied will be checked for word length and validated according to the checksum specified in BIP0039.
        Parameters:
        phrase - Phrase
        dictionary - Dictionary identifier
        wordCount - Word count
        Returns:
        Flag indicating if the mnemonic is valid or not

      • mnemonicDeriveSignKeys

        public CompletableFuture<Crypto.KeyPair> mnemonicDeriveSignKeys(String phrase,
                                                                String path,
                                                                Number dictionary,
                                                                Number wordCount)
        Validates the seed phrase, generates master key and then derives the key pair from the master key and the specified path
        Parameters:
        phrase - Phrase
        path - Derivation path, for instance "m/44'/396'/0'/0/0"
        dictionary - Dictionary identifier
        wordCount - Word count

      • hdkeyXprvFromMnemonic

        public CompletableFuture<String> hdkeyXprvFromMnemonic(String phrase,
                                                       Number dictionary,
                                                       Number wordCount)
        Generates an extended master private key that will be the root for all the derived keys
        Parameters:
        phrase - String with seed phrase
        dictionary - Dictionary identifier
        wordCount - Mnemonic word count
        Returns:
        Serialized extended master private key

      • hdkeyDeriveFromXprv

        public CompletableFuture<String> hdkeyDeriveFromXprv(String xprv,
                                                     Number childIndex,
                                                     Boolean hardened)
        Returns extended private key derived from the specified extended private key and child index
        Parameters:
        xprv - Serialized extended private key
        childIndex - Child index (see BIP-0032)
        hardened - Indicates the derivation of hardened/not-hardened key (see BIP-0032)
        Returns:
        Serialized extended private key

      • hdkeyDeriveFromXprvPath

        public CompletableFuture<String> hdkeyDeriveFromXprvPath(String xprv,
                                                         String path)
        Derives the exented private key from the specified key and path
        Parameters:
        xprv - Serialized extended private key
        path - Derivation path, for instance "m/44'/396'/0'/0/0"
        Returns:
        Derived serialized extended private key

      • hdkeySecretFromXprv

        public CompletableFuture<String> hdkeySecretFromXprv(String xprv)
        Extracts the private key from the serialized extended private key
        Parameters:
        xprv - Serialized extended private key
        Returns:
        Private key - 64 symbols hex string

      • hdkeyPublicFromXprv

        public CompletableFuture<String> hdkeyPublicFromXprv(String xprv)
        Extracts the public key from the serialized extended private key
        Parameters:
        xprv - Serialized extended private key
        Returns:
        Public key - 64 symbols hex string

      • chacha20

        public CompletableFuture<String> chacha20(String data,
                                          String key,
                                          String nonce)
        Performs symmetric `chacha20` encryption.
        Parameters:
        data - Source data to be encrypted or decrypted. Must be encoded with `base64`.
        key - 256-bit key. Must be encoded with `hex`.
        nonce - 96-bit nonce. Must be encoded with `hex`.
        Returns:
        Encrypted/decrypted data. Encoded with `base64`.
